mapper.insert: INSERT INTO disinfection_files( factory_num, disinfect_time, disinfect_name, disinfect_quality, disinfect_way, operator, remark, is_pass1, is_pass2, gmt_create ) VALUES( #{disinfectFilesModel.factoryNum}, #{disinfectFilesModel.disinfectTime}, #{disinfectFilesModel.disinfectName}, #{disinfectFilesModel.disinfectQuality}, #{disinfectFilesModel.disinfectWay}, #{disinfectFilesModel.operator}, #{disinfectFilesModel.remark}, #{disinfectFilesModel.isPass1}, #{disinfectFilesModel.isPass2}, #{disinfectFilesModel.gmtCreate} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM disinfection_files WHERE factory_num = #{factoryNum} AND disinfect_time BETWEEN #{gmtCreate} AND #{gmtTrans}
SELECT * FROM disinfection_files WHERE factory_num = #{factoryNum} AND disinfect_time = #{disinfectTime} AND disinfect_name = #{disinfectName}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM disinfection_files WHERE factory_num = #{factoryNum} AND disinfect_time = #{disinfectTime}
